metadata.title: CVE-2024-35789 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: wifi:mac80211: check/clear fast rx for non-4addr sta VLAN changes When moving astation out of a VLAN and deleting the VLAN afterwards, the fast_rx entrystill holds a pointer to the VLAN's netdev, which can cause use-after-freebugs. Fix this by immediately calling ieee80211_check_fast_rx after theVLAN change.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
